group.label: Eye protection worn/ in good cond.
Prescription safety glasses with side shields - Required
Hearing protection used by area ID- (Molding/Grinding)
Cut proof glove/sleeve worn / in good cond. (If knife in hand required)
All light curtains operational( Speak to operator before breaking)
No missing or damaged guards ( secondary equip, etc.)- (Watch moving parts, pinch point)
All electrical recepticles are in good repair & not overloaded.
Electrical cord are not on floor (Not in working/walking area)
Extension cords are in good repair and not used for permenant wiring.
No exposed wires, no missing knock outs, no broken conduit
All E-stops accessible/operational- (Emergency Stop)
All electrical disconnects clearly marked, closed & unobstructed (36in) ( Electrical disconnect)
Lock-out placards in place
Lock-out locks & tags in use
Forklift horn used/operational
Forklift seat belt used
Forklift P.M. daily checklist complete
Forklift backup alarms functional
Forklift strobe lights / headlights operational
Load heights observed
Forklift driving backward when view obstructed
Crane Inspection Complete
Crane Pendent in good repair
Hard Hats worn when hook is 5ft above floor
Welding curtain used/Hot work gear worn & in good cond.
Ladders stored properly
Ladders in good condition and inspection tag current
7-Minute Trainers complete for current month
Tops of all machines, shelves, closets, cabinets racks and emergency equipment are clean.
Propane tanks secured properly
All sharp tools (blades, knives, scalpels, box openers, etc.) in their proper storage location when not in use.
The floor area is free of debris/slip & fall hazards. No paper, trash or other items on the floor.
Part nests, tools and work surfaces are free of debris
Fire extinguishers not blocked/missing (36in)
Emergency lighting/exit marked & working
Emergency exits clear & closed
Evacuation route map accessible & route clear
Eye wash area clear & accessible (36in) Loc: (5) Deco, (1) Mtls Lab,(1) Maint, (1) 2nd Floor A, (2) Molding, (1) Seq., (1) Top Pad.
First Aid Stations Accessible
AED unit up to date
Spill kit area clear & accessible (36in) Loc: 2 PIT Area, Seq., Decco, IP
New chemical product stored properly -closed drums & totes
Hazardous & Waste containers labeled properly & closed
Secondary containers labled properly
All SAFEs reported within 24 hours (Incident & Near Miss)
Respirator stored in closed container
Respirator cartridge correct, in good condition & dated
Respirator worn properly & in good condition
